projectSection.title: Play's Lotto
projectSection.description: This is an app for a user and teammates to estimate the effort of a given task.

projectSection.title: Finding a new office
projectSection.description: This is an app where the user can enter where they live and where they would like the `new` office location.

projectSection.title: Pete's Ice Cream House
projectSection.description: At Pete's Ice Cream House you can select an ice cream cone, ice cream float, or a milkshake. There are six different flavors of ice cream, two different types of cones, three different soda flavors, and 3 different types of milk.

projectSection.title: Pete's Food Blog
projectSection.description: Check out some awesome food. (There is a lot of pizza)

projectSection.title: CODE talk
projectSection.description: I took the Android side of the age old debate... Android VS. iOS.  Check out the debate!

projectSection.title: CHS Tech Girl
projectSection.description: Suzelle Santos came by our office to interview our team about CODEcamp.

quotes.Eric Clapton: If you hand me a guitar, I'll play the blues. That's the place I automatically go

quotes.Stevie Ray Vaughan: I'm just doing the best I can now to keep this going... trying to grow up and remain young at the same time

quotes.Jimmy Page: I believe every guitar player inherently has something unique about their playing. They just have to identify what makes them different and develop it

quotes.John Mayer: Who I am as a guitarist is defined by my failure to become Jimi Hendrix
They say stay in the lines, but there's always something better on the other side
